video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Failover Clustering
video:video.video:description: This presentation provides an overview of failover clustering imporvements introduced in SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn. Jonathan Kehayias Principal Consultant, SQLskills

video:video.video:title: Demo: Configuring SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Failover Clustering
video:video.video:description: This demonstration shows how to configure the flexible failover policy for SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Failover Clustering. Jonathan Kehayias Principal Consultant, SQLskills

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Columnstore Indexes
video:video.video:description: Columnstore indexes provide an easy way to significantly improve data warehouse and decision support query performance against very large data sets. Joe Sack Principal Consultant, SQLskills

video:video.video:title: Demo: Accelerating Data Warehouse Queries with SQL Server 2012 Columnstore Indexes
video:video.video:description: This demonstration shows how to implement Columnstore Indexes, establish the performance impact for a standard data warehouse query and lastly show how to modify rows for a table with a Columnstore&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Maximizing Hardware Utilization with SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Active Secondary Replicas
video:video.video:description: This demonstration shows how to configure Readable Secondaries in an Availability group to maximize the utilization of the hardware in the environment by offloading Read Only workloads to the&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Readable Secondary Replicas
video:video.video:description: This presentation provides an overview of SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn support for readable secondary replicas which can help maximimize hardware utilization by servicing read-only workloads like backup&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Table Partitioning Improvements
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 offers several important improvements that related to table partitioning, including more partitions per table, improved online operations, better index build performance and new&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Table Partitioning in SQL Server 2012
video:video.video:description: This demo shows how to use the enhanced Partition Wizard to switch out and switch in a partition. We'll demonstrate this enhanced UI against a table with more than 1,000 partitions (by example&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Security and Auditing Improvements
video:video.video:description: In this presentation we'll cover SQL Server 2012 improvements that impact security and auditing, including new support for default schema for groups, user-defined server roles and various auditing&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Customizing Server Roles in SQL Server 2012
video:video.video:description: This demo shows how to create a user-defined server role in Transact-SQL. In five minutes we'll walk through how to create a role, add members, remove a member, grant permissions to the role and&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: SQL Server 2012 Extended Events Enhancements
video:video.video:description: This demonstration shows how to use the new Extended Events wizards and interfaces in SQL Server Management Studio. Jonathan Kehayias Principal Consultant, SQLskills

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing the SQL Server 2012 Distributed Replay Utility
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 introduces an important new utility called Distributed Replay that will change the way you benchmark and test your database workloads. Joe Sack Principal Consultant, SQLskills

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Transact-SQL Improvements
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 introduces several Transact-SQL improvements that impact developer productivity and support for key standards, including easier query results pagination and sequence generators. Dr&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Spatial Improvements
video:video.video:description: Developers who exploit spatial data types in their applications will find some helpful improvements in SQL Server 2012, including support for new shapes and methods, full globe support and spatial&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Declarative Database Development with SQL Server Data Tools
video:video.video:description: This demo provides a first look at SQL Server Data Tools and connected development with tools like the SQL Server Object Explorer and Query Window which will alleviate the need for developers to&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: What's New in .NET 4.0 and SQL Server 2012
video:video.video:description: This presentation covers new features that impact SQL Server developers in .NET 4.0. Dr Greg Low SQL Server MVP and Microsoft RD

video:video.video:title: Demo: Using ADO.NET Entity Framework Code-First Functionality
video:video.video:description: This demo shows how to create an ASP.NET MVC application that uses the model-first (also known as code-first) functionality provided by the ADO.NET Entity Framework. Dr Greg Low SQL Server MVP and&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing StreamInsight 1.2
video:video.video:description: StreamInsight 1.2 is a set of APIs and services included with SQL Server 2012 that helps database developers address real-time data processing workloads, and makes it it easy to develop standing&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Deduplicating Data with SQL Server 2012 Data Quality Services
video:video.video:description: This demonstration identifies and loads unique (non-duplicate) resellers into the Reseller entity of a Master Data Services (MDS) model. It involves creating a Data Quality Services (DQS) knowledge&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing High Availability and Disaster Recovery with SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn
video:video.video:description: This presentation provides an overview of the new high availabilty and disaster recovery capabilities provided by SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn, including Availability Groups, partial containment and&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Configuring SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Availability Groups (part 1 of 2)
video:video.video:description: This demonstration shows how to create a SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Availability Group and how to add an additional replica to an existing Availability Group using the SQL Server Management Studio&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Configuring a SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Availability Group Listener
video:video.video:description: This demonstration shows how to configure an Availability Group Listener for a SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Availability Group. The Availability Group Listener provides the Virtual Network Name that&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Extended Events Enhancements
video:video.video:description: SQL Server extended events enable rich diagnostic troubleshooting capabilities, and SQL Server 2012 provides new tools and APIs for extended events. Jonathan Kehayias Principal Consultant, SQLskills

video:video.video:title: Demo: SQL Server 2012 Distributed Replay
video:video.video:description: This demonstration shows how to launch the Distributed Replay controller and client, pre-process a trace file workload, launch the workload and validate that it is running through SQL Server Profiler.&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Simplified Result Set Paging with SQL Server 2012
video:video.video:description: This demo shows how to replace code that was based on CTEs and ROW_NUMBER() to provide query pagination in earlier versions of SQL Server, to use the new OFFSET and FETCH clauses provided by SQL&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Implementing a 'Nearest Neighbor' Spatial Query with SQL Server 2012
video:video.video:description: This demo shows you the types of queries that received a significant performance improvement when working with spatial data types in SQL Server 2012. Dr Greg Low SQL Server MVP and Microsoft RD

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Storing and Querying Documents with SQL Server 2012
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 combines the high performance database blob storage capabilities of FILESTREAM with new SMB file sharing capabilities of FileTable to enable rich support for content as an integrated&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Accessing Documents With SQL Server 2012 FileTable
video:video.video:description: This demo shows how to create a FileTable and to view the metadata provided by the FileTable feature. Dr Greg Low SQL Server MVP and Microsoft RD

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Express Local Database Runtime
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 Express Edition introduces a new deployment option called Local Database Runtime. LocalDb is a small shared component (not a service) that installs in five minutes or less that is&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Using SQL Server 2012 Express Local Database Runtime as an Embedded Database
video:video.video:description: This demonstration covers usage of SQL Server 2012 Express Local Database Runtime as an embedded database. Dr Greg Low SQL Server MVP and Microsoft RD

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server Data Tools
video:video.video:description: SQL Server Data Tools provides a modern development experience for building database applications, and makes it easy to target both your on-premise environment and the cloud. Dr Greg Low SQL Server&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Data Quality Services
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 Data Quality Services is a new knowledge-driven data cleansing solution that makes it easy to correct and de-duplicate data. DQS makes it easy for domain experts to build and improve&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing Data-Tier Applications
video:video.video:description: Data-Tier Applications, or DAC FX, provides a set of API's, tools and services that dramatically simplify developing, deploying and versioning databases for both your on-premise environment and the&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Performing an In-Place Upgrade of a Data-tier Application
video:video.video:description: The Data-Tier Application Framework (DAC Fx) is a powerful new way to deploy and upgrade database projects for both your on-premise and cloud applications. Prior releases of DAC Fx only supported&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Developing Standing Queries over Observable .NET Classes with StreamInsight 1.2
video:video.video:description: StreamInsight makes it easy to build standing queries over event-stream data that are continuously evaluated. StreamInsight 1.2 introduces support for observable .NET classes as an event source,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Integration Services Improvements
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 Integration Services introduces a host of new improvements of interest to developers and IT Professionals alike. Developers will appreciate a greatly improved package design&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Developing and Monitoring a SQL Server 2012 Integration Services Solution
video:video.video:description: This demonstration explores the new features of SQL Server 2012 Integration Services (SSIS). Specifically it covers project conversion, parameters, project connection managers, deployment to the SSIS&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Managing Data with SQL Server 2012 Master Data Services
video:video.video:description: This demonstration creates a new model and then uses the Master Data Services (MDS) Add-in for Excel to create and load two entities. Then in the Master Data Manager web application, the loaded&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Master Data Services Improvements
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 Master Data Services is a set of tools and services that can be used to integrate disparate information systems that share common data sets into a common master data management&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Analysis Services Improvements
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 Analysis Services introduces an impressive array of improvements designed to expand the reach a broader user base. SSAS brings together the existing multi-dimensional model with the&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Developing a SQL Server 2012 Analysis Services Tabular Project
video:video.video:description: This demonstration develops a basic tabular project in Visual Studio. The project will be enhanced in the following demonstration (SQL11UPD06-DEMO-02) by adding new Data Analysis Expressions (DAX)&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Exploring SQL Server 2012 Analysis Services Tabular Modeling
video:video.video:description: The SQL Server 2012 Analysis Services release embraces tabular model development. The tabular development approach, introduced with SQL Server 2008 R2 PowerPivot, is now available to the IT&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Exploring SQL Server 2012 Analysis Services DAX Improvements
video:video.video:description: This demonstration explores two topics related to Data Analysis Expressions (DAX) improvements in SQL Server 2012. Peter Myers Mentor, SolidQ

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Introducing SQL Server 2012 Reporting Services Improvements
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 Reporting Services has been upgraded with new features and capabilities, including an exciting new self-service visual design experience named Power View, increased end-user&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Configuring Data Alerts with SQL Server 2012 Reporting Services
video:video.video:description: This demonstration creates a shared data source, uploads an existing report definition, and then relates the report's data source to the newly created data source. Then it proceeds to create a new&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Configuring SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Availability Groups (part 2 of 2)
video:video.video:description: This demonstration shows how to create a SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Availability Group and how to add an additional replica to an existing Availability Group using the SQL Server Management Studio&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: Exploring SQL Server 2012 Power View
video:video.video:description: SQL Server 2012 Reporting Services introduces Power View, an interactive data exploration, visualization, and presentation experience which provides intuitive self-service reporting for business users&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: A First Look at SQL Server Data Tools
video:video.video:description: This demo provides a quick tour of the new SQL Server Data Tools. SSDT makes it easy to develop powerful database solutions that target both your on-premise environment and the cloud. Roger Doherty&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Presentation: SQL Server 2012 AlwaysOn Availability Group Connectivity
video:video.video:description: This presentation covers application connectivity to AlwaysOn Availability Groups using Availability Group Listeners. Jonathan Kehayias Principal Consultant, SQLskills

video:video.video:title: Roger Doherty: Introduction to SQL Server 2012
video:video.video:description: This presentation provides an overview of the key improvements in SQL Server 2012 from a developer perspective in the context of Microsoft's overall platform strategy. Roger Doherty Senior Program&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Demo: Exploring Self-Service Reporting with SQL Server 2012 Power View
video:video.video:description: This demonstration uploads an Excel workbook to the SharePoint PowerPivot Gallery library, and then uses it to produce a Power View report. Peter Myers Mentor, SolidQ
